TopicTitle: Kraken mad for me or what?

Articles.Content:
And yet again kraken attack. Kerbin escape and that Ap is 330M km away. Game does me this now every time when I am trying to escape towards inner planets. No matter how hard I try to escape kerbin pulls me back in. Towards outer planets escape works fine. This started to occur today. O.o

Edit: Installing game again helped in this case.

Edited February 6, 2014 by TUFOM
